summary: Adds 6 new spells to Skyrim for your pleasure.
descriptionHtml:
WATCH VIDEO

This mod adds 6 new alteration spells to Skyrim that will make you a force to be reckoned with. With spells like Advanced telekinesis, Power Paralyze, Divine Protection and more your enemies wont know what hit them.

These spells can be found by teleporting there using a spell found on Alvor\'s workbench, in Riverwood. They also come with a set of robes that will make alteration easier.

Yes, these spell are OP. if requested enough, ill make a non-OP version. No, no new spells will be made. 

The Robes work with in both males and females.

SPELLS
Advanced Telekinesis: Pull people and animals towards you and throw them away
Eject: Stun, knock down and send enimies flying away.
Human Rocket: Send pople or annimals high into the sky
Detect All: Detect living and dead things
Divine Protection: 100% damage resistance
Power Paralyze: Paralyze in a huge area for 30 seconds

Watch Video to answer questions and such
author: DJSuperGenius
